feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.48.1: Security Update
entry.content:
This release fixes CVE-2024-51989 (a potential XSS vulnerability) that was introduced in v1.41.1.

All users that are self-hosting and using the login system, please update to this version to best mitigate risk. Details, description and more available in the Github Security Advisory.

Thanks to @igniter07 for reporting!

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Sanitize Confirmation Parameter (#2736) @pglombardo
  • Allow Anonymous=false: Fix after sign up redirect path (#2735) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump parser from 3.3.5.1 to 3.3.6.0 (#2734) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump json from 2.7.5 to 2.7.6 (#2733) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.48.1

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.49.0: Trust Only Local Proxies Unless Overridden
entry.content:
This release fixes CVE-2024-52796 where an attacker could spoof the X-Forwarded-For header to bypass the rate limiter.

If you are using an external proxy that is not on the local network, see this documentation on how to authorize the IP of your remote proxy.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Security: Only trust local proxies unless overidden (#2797) @pglombardo
  • [Snyk] Upgrade esbuild from 0.23.1 to 0.24.0 (#2796) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Yarn package updates (#2782) @pglombardo
  • Latest Language Strings (#2779) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.7.0 to 6.8.1 (#2795) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1009.0 to 1.1010.0 (#2794) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump mutex_m from 0.2.0 to 0.3.0 (#2793) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump prime from 0.1.2 to 0.1.3 (#2792) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.42.0 to 1.42.1 (#2791) @dependabot

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.171.0 to 1.172.0 (#2789) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump kramdown from 2.4.0 to 2.5.1 (#2788) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1007.0 to 1.1009.0 (#2786) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump pry from 0.14.2 to 0.15.0 (#2784) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump solid_queue from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 (#2785) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.170.1 to 1.171.0 (#2775) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump mini_portile2 from 2.8.7 to 2.8.8 (#2776) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump json from 2.8.1 to 2.8.2 (#2774) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1006.0 to 1.1007.0 (#2773) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rackup from 2.2.0 to 2.2.1 (#2772) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1005.0 to 1.1006.0 (#2771) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.49.1: Account Locking & Cookie Security
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Login: Lock accounts after 10 failed attempts (#2806) @pglombardo
  • Passphrase: Increase cookie security (#2805) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2807) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.5.11 to 0.5.12 (#2818) @dependabot
